thread.title: People can’t cope with the penalty drama in Sevilla v Leicester City
thread.title_full: People can’t cope with the penalty drama in Sevilla v Leicester City

author: Rebecca Knight
title: People can’t cope with the penalty drama in Sevilla v Leicester City
text:
People can’t cope with the penalty drama in Sevilla v Leicester City By Rebecca Knight   Stonewall 
Manchester United went through in the Europa League – and Leicester City were up right after them in the Champions League. 
After their terrible form this term and Sevilla’s excellent displays, people feared for them – and when Wes Morgan gave away a stonewall penalty early on, it looked like things were going to get very bad very quickly for the club. 
Kasper Schmeichel has been the hero of the hour this season on more than one occasion – and stepped up again for the club. 
Twitter felt Morgan was the bad boy of the night – and they knew who the hero was as well, with Leicester’s stopper making save, after save after save. 
Sevilla were a goal to the good at the break, but it could’ve been so much more. The best of Twitter
